io.vertx.core.metrics.spi

Interface VertxMetrics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseMetrics, Measured
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyVertxMetrics

    public interface VertxMetrics
extends BaseMetrics, Measured
    There's one instance of this per Vert.x instance
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli
